changelog:
## Changes in v1.0.31

### Bug Fixes (TV Guide)
- Fixed continue watching progress not updating when returning from player in TV Guide Film/Serie sections
- Fixed focus lost when dismissing movie/series detail dialog (now returns to poster grid)
- Fixed focus lost when returning from Series Episodes page

### Previous fixes (v1.0.30)
- Fixed EPG dialog appearing when pressing RIGHT twice quickly from categories in FILM/SERIES sections
